title: Yennachu Yedhachu Lyrics Trisha Illana Nayanthara
stanzas:
ennachu edhaachu
yedhedho aayachu
kaanadha kannukulla
kaadhal ippo kankaatchi.

poovachu ponnachu
poo nenju punnachu
nee thotta neram
 ippo neruppa aachu
en moochu

un nenapula naan vaada
en usurula nee thaeda
mazhai veyilena
paakka venaam
mayangida vaadi manasoda

nadu iravila aal illa
thudi thudikiren vaa mella
idhu varai naan paathathilla
iruttukulla ada ivan tholla

kannil nee vandhu kadhai pesa
kanavil unnala siricheney
ulagam ellame thaduthaalum
unakku thunaiyaaga irupeney

un aasai naan
en aasai nee
peraasai aavoma
kan moodiye kai koorthu thaan
kaanaamal povoma

anbe un kangal rendum
en kaadhal kannadi.
suriya kan paarkum munne
nee vaada munnadi.

ennodu nee unnodu naan
verenna sandhegam
kaiyodu vaa pinnikolla
neethaanda sandhosam

nammodu yaarum illa
vekkam enna vekkam enna
ennodu naane illa
 enna panna enna panna

paavada raatinam pole
nee enna suthaadha
un meesai mullalale nee
rosaavai kuthatha

ennachu edhaachu
yedhedho aayachu
kaanadha kannukulla
kaadhal ippo kankaatchi.

poovachu ponnachu
poo nenju punnachu
nee thotta neram
 ippo neruppa aachu
en moochu

un nenapula naan vaada
en usurula nee thaeda
mazhai veyilena
paakka venaam
mayangida vaadi manasoda

nadu iravila aal illa
thudi thudikiren vaa mella
idhu varai naan paathathilla
iruttukulla ada ivan tholla

kannil nee vandhu kadhai pesa
kanavil unnala siricheney
ulagam ellame thaduthaalum
unakku thunaiyaaga irupeney
